evidence.claim: Vericle utilizes AWS for its cloud infrastructure, ensuring scalability and performance.
The platform is compliant with HIPAA standards to ensure secure handling of patient data.
Vericle mentions use of FHIR for health data exchange on their technical documentation.
X12 EDI transactions are supported as part of Vericle's billing workflow.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence found linking to X12 transactions or clearinghouse services.
